/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is flanked by lush green trees and towering buildings, creating a harmonious blend of nature and architecture. The sky overhead is overcast, casting a soft, diffused light over the scene. Cars and buses traverse the road, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static cityscape. Power lines crisscross above, punctuating the skyline with their metallic sheen. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the grandeur of the buildings and the vastness of the sky.
